tasks.title: Setup Project Repository and Environment
tasks.description: Create a new project repository and set up the necessary environment for development.

tasks.title: Implement Weekly Review Screen Card Deck
tasks.description: Refactor the current card system to support a deck of 3 cards with unique questions.

tasks.title: Implement Infinite Swipable Card Deck
tasks.description: Add infinite looping to the card deck for smooth swiping.

tasks.title: Add Countdown Timer Row to Weekly Review Screen
tasks.description: Implement a row of countdown timers below the card deck.

tasks.title: Wire Timers to Cards for Auto-Swipe
tasks.description: Automatically swipe cards based on timer elapse.

tasks.title: Implement Fallback Timer
tasks.description: Add a fallback timer to the timer row.

tasks.title: Preserve Existing TimeTimer Component
tasks.description: Ensure the existing TimeTimer component remains unchanged.

tasks.title: Implement Monthly Review Screen Card Deck and Timers
tasks.description: Adapt the card deck and timer logic for Monthly Review Screen with 4 cards.

tasks.title: Ensure UI/UX Consistency
tasks.description: Ensure all UI/UX elements are consistent with the app's design.

tasks.title: Test and Validate Implementation
tasks.description: Conduct thorough testing to validate all features.
